DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety superiority Roux-Y versus Billroth II gastrojejunostomy reconstruction delay gastric empty pancreatoduodenectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Billroth II Versus Roux-en-Y Gastrojejunostomy Pancreatoduodenectomy
DOC.criteria: Consecutive series patient undergoing pancreaticoduodenectomy ( PD ) . Given informed consent . Inability perform pancreatogastrostomy . Resection organ , except superior mesentericportal vein . Previous gastric surgery . Preoperative gastric duodenal obstruction . Previous complex abdominal surgery .
